structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS

law.text: Any violation of any provision of KRS 77.150 to 77.175 may be enjoined in a civil action brought by the air pollution control board, the air pollution control officer, or any person aggrieved by such violation. Such abatement may be in addition to the fine hereinafter provided.
law.history: Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 53, sec. 42, effective March 14, 1952.
